about_the_game:
Elven Forest


Rescue captivating elf girls from an enchanted forest in this fantasy adventure. Wield your sword and free imprisoned beauties trapped by dark magic. Immerse yourself in vibrant landscapes, intriguing challenges, and alluring encounters along the way.

Story


Our heroine, a fearless knight armed with a powerful sword, ventures deep into an enchanted forest to rescue captivating elf girls imprisoned by dark magic. These seductive beings, embodying the beauty and magic of the forest, are trapped behind mystical barriers. Guided by bravery and determination, she must slash through obstacles, conquer evil, and free the elves. Every path holds new dangers, but each victory brings her closer to becoming the savior of the enchanted forest and its alluring inhabitants.

Futures

  • Captivating Animations: Beautifully animated characters and environments bring the game to life.
  • Seductive Elf Girls: Each level introduces alluring elves to rescue.
  • Seasonal Changes: Experience lush summer, vibrant autumn, and serene winter.
  • Relaxing Soundtrack: Atmospheric music enhances the magical journey.
  • Dynamic Challenges: Use your sword to clear obstacles and uncover secrets.
  • Charming Visuals: A vibrant forest filled with fantasy elements.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

name: Elven Forest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4330 / AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 Ti or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 Ti or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Danish, Indonesian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
